hf.name: Old Oak
hf.appearance: Gnarled oak tree with a face in its trunk

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the heart of the enchanted forest, Luna discovered her extraordinary gift.
json_to_edit.description: Young Luna communicates telepathically with forest animals and the ancient tree spirit.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Rustling leaves, bird calls, gentle wind
json_to_edit.name: Forest Whispers
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Luna discovers her ability to communicate telepathically with animals and the ancient tree spirit in an enchanted forest.

qa.action: Luna enters a sun-dappled forest clearing, surrounded by curious woodland creatures.

hf.action: Luna approaches the ancient oak tree, its face barely visible in the gnarled bark.

tr.action: Luna's eyes widen as she hears the thoughts of a nearby deer in her mind.

xc.action: Various animals gather around Luna, responding to her unspoken communication.

ka.action: The face in the Old Oak tree becomes more pronounced as it communicates with Luna.

fn.action: Luna stands in the center of the clearing, surrounded by animals and bathed in magical light from the Old Oak.

edit_command: Add one more shot to the scene
